word: Marian's Caution While Working on Patriarchs and Prophets in 1889.--Willie [W. C. White] [WILLIAM C. WHITE, SON OF ELLEN WHITE, AT THE TIME SERVING AS ACTING PRESIDENT OF THE GENERAL CONFERENCE.] is in meeting early and late, devising, planning for the doing of better and more efficient work in the cause of God. We see him only at the table.
